transArray.content: The hotel is newly renovated. The room is very clean and the toilet has automatic heating. The environment is also very good. The breakfast has many kinds and tastes very good. The lady at the front desk is very attentive and even gave us a flower for Valentine's Day. She also arranged a hotel car to take us to the subway station. , I will choose this hotel next time I come to BeijingðŸ¤—

Hello, my dear. You will be a positive person who reads gentle sentences and sees the sunshine. Your eyes are full of tenderness and smiles. May the stars in your eyes be overflowing with gentleness and be extremely gentle. I love you Hantingyo.
